translations.translation: Herein are really signs for those who discern.
There are great Signs in this for those endowed with intelligence.
In this there is evidence (of the Truth) for the prudent ones.
Indeed in this are signs for people who perceive.
Surely, in this are signs for those who see.
Surely in this are signs for those who examine.
Surely in that are signs for such as mark;
Lo! therein verily are portents for those who read the signs.
There are certainly signs in that for those who can learn a lesson --
Verily therein are signs for men of sagacity.
There are indeed signs in that for the percipient.
Behold! in this are Signs for those who by tokens do understand.
Surely! In this are signs, for those who see (or understand or learn the lessons from the Signs of Allah).
Surely, in that there are signs for those who contemplate.
Surely in that are lessons for those who read signs.
Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
[15:75] Indeed in that, which is mentioned, there are signs, indications of God’s Oneness, for those who take note, [those who] observe and take heed.

Lo! Therein) in that which We did to them (verily are portents) signs and lessons (for those who read the signs) it is also said that this means: for those who meditate; and also: for those who can see; and: for hose who take admonition.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { إِنَّ فِي ذَلِكَ } الإهلاك والتقليب والإمطار { لآيَاتٍ } وعبر { لِلْمُتَوَسِّمِينَ } [الحجر: 75] المتأملين المتفرسين، المتعمقين في أنية الأشياء ولميتّها حتى ينكشف عليهم أمرها وسمتها، ولا تترددوا ولا تشكوا أيها السامعون المعتبرون في انقلاب تلك المدينة وتخريبها
